mdRecord.dcterms:creator: McCaul, Alexander
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Knew Jefferson was preparing to return to America; delayed writing as he did not know the fate of [John] Paradise's call on Dr. Bancroft; now acknowledges letter from Paris of Aug. 3rd with two bills enclosed - one on for L124 which was passed, one on Dr. Bancroft for L176 is waiting till next April for payment; has written James Lyle who is empowered by partners to settle all company's affairs in Virginia.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Paradise, John, 1748-1795
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1790 January 15, Glasgow, [Scotland], to Thomas Jefferson, Virginia.
